About Me

My name is Gavin Wye I'm a User Experience Designer and Consultant with 10 years experience. In the past I have worked with client such as Nando's, J.K.Rowlings' Pottermore, Visa, Channel4 and National Rail Enquiries.

I live in Tynemouth a small village on the North East coast of England.

Follow me on Twitter for general waffle.
